metadata.title: DPM/FM departs to Islamabad after concluding his two-day visit to Malaysia

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jul 12 (APP):Deputy Prime Minister/Foreign Minister Mohammad Ishaq Dar on Saturday departed from Kuala Lumpur to Islamabad after a successful two-day visit to Malaysia for the 32nd Asian Regional Forum Ministerial Meeting. "Besides participating at the ARF2025 and related events, he also called on Prime Minister of Malaysia Anwar Ibrahim, in Putrajaya, held 12 bilateral meetings on the sidelines with Foreign Ministers of friendly countries, and addressed the vibrant Pakistani community in Kuala Lumpur," Foreign Office Spokesperson said in a press release.
